pkgmetadata.longdescription: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata // Metadata about populations and data about samples from the 1000 Genomes Project, including the 2,504 samples sequenced for the Phase 3 release and the expanded collection of 3,202 samples with 602 additional trios. The data is described in Auton et al. (2015) doi:10.1038/nature15393 and Byrska-Bishop et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/j.cell.2022.08.004, and raw data is available at http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/. See Turner (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2210.00539 for more details.
